title: Typophile of the Year. Find your mojo in Memphis.
content:
Allan Haley, Director of Words and Letters at Monotype Imaging, will crown the "Typophile of the Year" here in Memphis in a couple of weeks. I’ve linked a blurb from Fast Company mentioning this. I’m looking forward to seeing some of you in this funky little town.

[Fast Company: AIGA Design Conference/Typographic Quiz](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014214003/http:/www.fastcompany.com/blog/fast-company-calendar/fast-company-now-blog/aiga-design-conference)

[http://designconference2009.aiga.org/content.cfm/mojo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014214003/http:/designconference2009.aiga.org/content.cfm/mojo)

For what it's worth, I think Elvis was far more Akzidenz-Grotesk than Rockwell, which is a little too Nashville for Elvis. TCB.
author: BlueStreak
